item.title: Knowing, Loving, and Growing
item.description:
Knowing, Loving, and Growing by Elder Hans T. Boom, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 189th Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2019
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Hans T. Boom, Of the Seventy

item.title: True to the Faith That Our Parents Have Cherished
item.description:
True to the Faith That Our Parents Have Cherished by Elder Hans T. Boom, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 195th Annual General Conference on Mon Mar 31 2025
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
